longBusinessSummary: Bee Vectoring Technologies International Inc. focuses on the control of pests, and enhancement of crops and ornamentals through the biological controls in a variety of application processes in the United States. The company's solutions comprise the Hive & Bees, an inoculum dispenser system; Vectorpak, a removable, easy-to-use tray that contain Vectorite, a specially formulated patented powder made from various natural materials; active ingredients, such as BVT-CR7, an organic strain of a natural occurring endophytic fungus; and pollen distribution systems. Its patented and patent pending technology utilizes bees as natural delivery mechanisms for a variety of powdered mixtures comprising organic compounds, used products which inhibit, and eliminate common crop diseases. The company also provides natural pest and disease management solutions for various crops, such as strawberries, sunflowers, apples, tomatoes, canola crops, blueberries, and other crops. Bee Vectoring Technologies International Inc. is headquartered in Mississauga, Canada.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Kyle Michael Appleby CA, CPA
